projects.title: DID
projects.description: Developing a solution for unique identity over the internet using the concept of SSI (Self Sovereign Identity) using Blockchain and using it to replace the traditional methods of verification. Frameworks used are Hyperledger Indy, Hyperledger Aries and Hyperledger Ursa.

projects.title: EaseShop
projects.description: This is a completly Responsive E-commerce website, made with the purpose of helping businesses have an online presence and to increase their sales. It includes features like product filtering, input validation, password hashing and much more...

projects.title: Web Template
projects.description: This is a complete Responsive Website Frontend Template for helping businesses have an online presence. It includes buttons which are fully functioning and features like Validating Users Input and much more...
